title: Understanding Discovery Infrastructure
text: Discovery infrastructure on the PULL side involves mechanisms to gather and update metadata from various sources. This ensures that the data remains current and relevant.

title: Components of PULL Side Infrastructure
text: Consider the different tools and methods used to collect metadata. These can include automated systems like crawlers and event-based listeners.

title: Evaluating the Options
text: Which of the following options best describes the components of the PULL side discovery $$infrastructure$$?
choices: Crawlers that periodically collect information from metadata sources
Other bespoke tools are necessary given the volume and diversity of data most companies are grappling with
Event based listeners for near real time metadata collection to capture time sensitive information such as data quality or metadata versioning
